@graph.name: Rye & Almond Flour Vegan Burger Buns & Sandwich Bread
@graph.description: Pillowy and soft Rye & Almond Flour Vegan Burger Buns that can also be turned into a sandwich bread recipe! Easy and wholesome, vegan & soy-free!

itemListElement.name: Rye Almond Sandwich Bread and Burger Buns. Vegan Recipe

@graph.name: Rye Almond Sandwich Bread Loaf and Burger Buns - Vegan
@graph.description: Pillowy and soft Rye & Almond Flour Vegan Burger Buns that can also be turned into a sandwich bread recipe! Easy and wholesome, vegan & soy-free! Allergen Information: Dairy, egg, corn, soy-free. Can be made Oil-free
recipeIngredient: 1.25 cups Rye flour (I use Arrow head mills)
1/2 cup  almond flour (heaping cup, I used ground raw almond. Ground at home)
1 Tablespoon agave syrup (or 2 teaspoons raw sugar, or maple syrup)
1 Tablespoons extra virgin olive oil  (optional, or virgin coconut oil)
1 Tablespoon unsweetened Cocoa powder (or more for a darker color)
Add a teaspoon of caraway seeds.
Replace 1/2 cup water with 1/2 cup almond milk (half the amount of liquid)

itemListElement.text: In a large bowl, add 1/2 cup warm water, 1 teaspoon raw sugar and yeast. Mix and let sit until frothy(10 minutes).
itemListElement.name: In a large bowl, add 1/2 cup warm water, 1 teaspoon raw sugar and yeast. Mix and let sit until frothy(10 minutes).

itemListElement.text: In a bowl, mix the flours(rye, almond, bread, wheat gluten) and salt. Add the flours to the yeast mixture.
itemListElement.name: In a bowl, mix the flours(rye, almond, bread, wheat gluten) and salt. Add the flours to the yeast mixture.

itemListElement.text: Add agave, oil, cocoa powder, rest of the water and knead 6-8 minutes in stand mixer, or 8-10 minutes by hand. I used 1 Tablespoon cocoa. Use more for a darker bread.
itemListElement.name: Add agave, oil, cocoa powder, rest of the water and knead 6-8 minutes in stand mixer, or 8-10 minutes by hand. I used 1 Tablespoon cocoa. Use more for a darker bread.

itemListElement.text: If the dough is sticky, then add a little bread flour until the dough is soft and almost not sticky. Place dough in a well-greased container. Cover with a towel and let sit in a warm place for 1.5 hours or until doubled.
itemListElement.name: If the dough is sticky, then add a little bread flour until the dough is soft and almost not sticky. Place dough in a well-greased container. Cover with a towel and let sit in a warm place for 1.5 hours or until doubled.

itemListElement.text: Punch dough down, use a Tablespoon or so bread flour to help handle the dough and knead for a few seconds.
itemListElement.name: Punch dough down, use a Tablespoon or so bread flour to help handle the dough and knead for a few seconds.

itemListElement.text: Pull a bit on all sides and tuck under to get a taut top. Place the tucked side down on parchment-lined or well-greased bread pan. Or flatten the dough and roll like a jelly roll. Place with seam side down in the bread pan.
itemListElement.name: Pull a bit on all sides and tuck under to get a taut top. Place the tucked side down on parchment-lined or well-greased bread pan. Or flatten the dough and roll like a jelly roll. Place with seam side down in the bread pan.

itemListElement.text: Spray water liberally on top, then sprinkle some flour, sesame seeds or oats on top. Or spray oil. Cover with a towel and let rise for 40 minutes or until doubled.
itemListElement.name: Spray water liberally on top, then sprinkle some flour, sesame seeds or oats on top. Or spray oil. Cover with a towel and let rise for 40 minutes or until doubled.

itemListElement.text: Bake at 365 degrees F for 35-40 minutes, or until a tap on the top sounds hollow.
itemListElement.name: Bake at 365 degrees F for 35-40 minutes, or until a tap on the top sounds hollow.

itemListElement.text: To make buns, divide the dough into 6 or so equal size pieces.
itemListElement.name: To make buns, divide the dough into 6 or so equal size pieces.

itemListElement.text: Roll into balls or shape by pulling on all sides and place on a parchment-lined sheet.
itemListElement.name: Roll into balls or shape by pulling on all sides and place on a parchment-lined sheet.

itemListElement.text: Spray liberally with water. Sprinkle liberally with sesame seeds or other seeds of choice
itemListElement.name: Spray liberally with water. Sprinkle liberally with sesame seeds or other seeds of choice

itemListElement.text: Cover with a towel and let rise for 30 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Cover with a towel and let rise for 30 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Bake in preheated 365 degrees F for 25-30 minutes until the tops are golden brown and sound hollow on a tap.
itemListElement.name: Bake in preheated 365 degrees F for 25-30 minutes until the tops are golden brown and sound hollow on a tap.

@graph.keywords: almond flour bread, vegan burger buns recipe, vegan sandwich bread
